jobs.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.job_description:
- Working on all stages of projects (planning, development, quality control, production)

- Design, build and ongoing maintenance of our strategic platform and tooling.

- Producing machine learning models including supervised and unsupervised methods

- Rapidly prototyping proof-of-concept idea

- Converting proof-of-concept projects to enterprise solutions

- Producing reports and presentations to communicate findings to stakeholders

- Investigate and understand emerging trends in data-related approaches, performing horizon-scanning that present current and future opportunities for the business.

**Team Working**

- Be an active member of the data & analytics team, contribute to team dynamics, ways of working and assisting with improvement opportunities

- Be an active member of internal Data and Analytics communities to contribute to team dynamics, ways of working and assisting with improvement opportunities

- Provide regular and accurate reports of progress to technical leads and the Project lead where required.

- Build strong relationships with stakeholders with a view to providing high-value solutions within the business whilst keeping communication channels always open

- Maintain strong technical awareness and familiarity with new and upcoming technologies around Data Integration and Business Intelligence Analysis. Be prepared to give a presentation or provide mentoring of any new technology or skills acquired in a collegiate environment
- Stay abreast of the industry and participate in external communities to keep up to date and offer the most informed position when defining or consulting on solution design

**Knowledge**

- Knowledge of common data science techniques including data preparation, exploration and visualisation.

- Knowledge of data mining techniques in one or more areas of statistical modelling methods, time series, text mining, optimization, information retrieval.

- Ability to produce workflows using classification, clustering, regression, and dimensionality reduction.

- Ability to prototype statistical analysis and modelling algorithms and apply these algorithms for data driven solutions to problems in new domains.

- Ability to prototype statistical analysis and modelling algorithms and apply these algorithms for data driven solutions to problems in new domains.

- Knowledge of industry best practice in deploying data science solutions

- Strong knowledge of the AWS we'll Architected Framework(s)

Role: Machine Learning Engineer,

Industry Type: Travel & Tourism,

Department: Data Science & Analytics,

Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent

Role Category: Data Science & Machine Learning

Education

UG: Any Graduate

PG: Any Postgraduate

Key Skills

Text mining, Statistical analysis, Prototype, data science, Consulting, Machine learning, Information retrieval, Data mining, Business intelligence, Analytics.

jobs.title: Senior AI/ML Developer
jobs.job_description: Ispeck Digital Solutions Pvt Ltd, a Kolkata based AI/ML innovative startup (operating since 2021) and working with reputed foreign collaborations, is seeking an experienced hands-on AI/ML Engineer / Full Stack Data Scientist to lead the development, deployment, and optimization of our machine learning infrastructure, with a particular focus on vision models, LLM/SLMs, and advanced ML systems. Key Responsibilities: - Design and implement end-to-end machine learning solutions, including LLMs, SLMs, and computer vision models - Lead research initiatives to improve model performance and explore cutting-edge AI technologies - Develop and maintain ML pipelines in cloud environments using containerization and orchestration tools - Optimize model performance, scalability, and efficiency across our AI infrastructure - Drive technical decision-making for AI/ML architecture and implementation strategies. Required Qualifications: - Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related field - 5+ years of hands-on experience developing and deploying production ML models - Strong expertise in modern deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow) - Proven experience with LLMs, transformer architectures, and vision models, ViT - Advanced knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and MLOps practices - Proficiency in containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes) - Extensive knowledge of modern GPU and Edge Devices architecture like Jetson, Raspberry, Xylinx or similar. Technical Skills: - Deep learning and neural network architectures - Encoder/Decoder/Transformer architectures - Natural Language Processing and Computer Vision - Distributed computing and model parallelization - CI/CD pipelines for ML workflows - Python, C/C++/Rust/Go/C#, SQL/NoSQL, and version control systems - Model optimization and fine-tuning techniques. Role & responsibilities: Preferred candidate profile: Only local Kolkata based candidates with requisite experience and qualifications as specified, should apply. We are not looking to hire outstation candidates. Perks and benefits: Performance Linked Incentive, Health Insurance, Leave Benefits. Candidates available to join within 30 days will be given preference.

jobs.title: Senior Data Scientist-Computer Vision
jobs.job_description:
We are seeking a dynamic and innovative Image Scientist with 8-13 years of experience in the Data Science and AI industry to join our team in Kolkata, West Bengal. As an Image Scientist, you will play a crucial role in driving thought leadership and innovation in the field of image processing and analysis. This position offers a unique opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and contribute to the growth and success of Adani while fostering a culture of excellence and collaboration.

Roles and Responsibilities
As an Image Scientist at Adani, you will be responsible for:
- Developing and implementing advanced algorithms and models for image recognition, segmentation, and feature extraction.
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and optimize image processing pipelines and workflows.
- Contributing to the development and enhancement of AI-based systems for image interpretation and understanding.
- Utilizing machine learning and deep learning techniques to extract meaningful insights from image data.
- Evaluating and validating the performance of image processing algorithms through rigorous testing and analysis.
- Communicating complex technical concepts and findings to non-technical stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.
- Participating in the creation and maintenance of high-quality documentation and technical reports related to image science projects.
- Continuously exploring new methodologies and technologies to improve the efficiency and accuracy of image analysis processes.
- Adhering to industry best practices and standards while ensuring compliance with data privacy and security regulations.

Experience
- 8-13 years of experience in the Data Science and AI industry with a focus on image processing and analysis.

Education Qualification
- Bachelor or master’s degree or Ph.D in Computer Science, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.

Certification required
- Certifications in machine learning, computer vision, or image processing would be an advantage.

Behavioural Skills
- Strong analytical and critical thinking skills.
- Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
- Effective communication and collaboration skills.
- Adaptability and willingness to learn and explore new technologies.

Technical Skills
- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java.
- Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries, such as TensorFlow, Keras, or PyTorch.
- Working knowledge of image processing tools and libraries, such as OpenCV, scikit-image, or PIL.
- Familiarity with deep learning architectures and techniques for image analysis.
- Experience with cloud platforms and services for data storage and processing, such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.

Non-Negotiable Skills
- Proficiency in image processing techniques and computer vision algorithms
- Advanced knowledge of machine learning, deep learning, and neural networks
- Cloud development and deployment of AI systems

jobs.title: Senior Deep Learning / Computer Vision Engineer
jobs.job_description:
We are seeking a Senior Deep Learning / Computer Vision Engineer to enhance our pioneering AI-driven diagnostic tools at Artelus. You will play a critical role in developing and refining algorithms that analyze medical imaging data, focusing on applications like diabetic retinopathy screening with DRISTi and retinal analysis using our portable 5g OCT device. Your expertise will drive innovations that improve the accuracy and functionality of our products, directly impacting patient outcomes globally.

About you
As a seasoned engineer, you possess deep expertise in deep learning, computer vision, and machine learning frameworks. Your background includes substantial experience with neural networks, particularly in medical image analysis or similar fields. You are proficient in Python and familiar with AI frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch. Your approach to problem-solving is creative and efficient, aimed at developing solutions that are not only effective but also scalable and robust. You are enthusiastic about mentoring junior team members and leading by example in both technical and project management aspects. You value precision and are committed to advancing healthcare through technology. Additionally, experience with model containerization, API building, and deployment to Kubernetes environments is a plus, enhancing your ability to integrate advanced technologies into scalable production systems.

Your Role
In this position, you will be responsible for:
- Developing cutting-edge deep learning models that enhance our capability to diagnose and monitor various medical conditions.
- Innovating and improving computer vision algorithms that integrate with our medical imaging devices.
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to integrate these technologies into our existing products.
- Leading projects and initiatives that push the boundaries of what our technology can achieve in medical diagnostics.
- Develop APIs and manage the deployment of models into production environments using containers and Kubernetes.

Responsibilities
- Lead the design and implementation of new features and algorithms for real-time medical image processing.
- Optimize existing AI models to improve efficiency and accuracy.
- Conduct research and apply the latest advancements in deep learning and computer vision to our product development.
- Ensure the highest standards of quality and performance in all engineering efforts.
- Develop APIs and manage the deployment of models into production environments using containers and Kubernetes.

Requirements
We are looking for someone who is not just a technical expert but also a visionary in their field. The ideal candidate will have:
- A strong theoretical and practical background in deep learning and computer vision.
- Proven experience with Python and major AI frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
- A track record of innovative problem-solving in complex, technically challenging environments.
- Experience in medical image analysis is highly preferred.
- Familiarity with model containerization, API development, and Kubernetes is highly regarded.

We offer you
- The opportunity to be at the forefront of AI in healthcare, making significant impacts on global health.
- A collaborative environment that values innovation and supports your professional growth.
- A role where your contributions are directly linked to improving patient care and diagnostic accuracy across the world.

jobs.title: Engineer, Senior-Machine learning
jobs.job_description: As a leading technology innovator, Qualcomm pushes the boundaries of what's possible to enable next-generation experiences and drives digital transformation to help create a smarter, connected future for all. As a Qualcomm Software Engineer, you will design, develop, create, modify, and validate embedded and cloud edge software, applications, and/or specialized utility programs that launch cutting-edge, world class products that meet and exceed customer needs. Qualcomm Software Engineers collaborate with systems, hardware, architecture, test engineers, and other teams to design system-level software solutions and obtain information on performance requirements and interfaces. Minimum Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 2+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience. OR Master's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 1+ year of Software Engineering or related work experience. OR PhD in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field. 2+ years of academic or work experience with Programming Language such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc. Preferred Qualifications: Master's Degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science or related field. 4+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience. 2+ years of experience with Database Management Software. 2+ years of experience with API. 1+ year of work experience with Git, Perforce, or Source Code Management System. Principal Duties and Responsibilities: Applies Software knowledge and experience to design, develop, create, modify, and validate embedded and cloud edge software, applications, and/or specialized utility programs. Analyzes user needs and software requirements to design and customize software for optimal operational efficiency. Designs and implements software modules for products and systems. Participates in the design, coding for large features, unit testing, significant debugging fixes, and integration efforts to ensure projects are completed to specifications and schedules. Performs code reviews and regression tests as well as triages and fixes issues to ensure the quality of code. Collaborates with others inside project team to accomplish project objectives. Writes technical documentation for Software projects. Level of Responsibility: Works under supervision. Decision-making may affect work beyond immediate work group. Requires verbal and written communication skills to convey information. May require basic negotiation, influence, tact, etc. Tasks do not have defined steps planning, problem-solving, and prioritization must occur to complete the tasks effectively.

jobs.title: Senior ML Lead
jobs.job_description:
Chief Data Office (CDO) is a Mars Wrigley program that harnesses the power of data and insights to solve some of the critical business-wide problems we face - unlocking quality growth and excellence.

Through CDO, we deliver connected insights across the entire Snacking ecosystem. We empower our Associates with the right data, tools and capabilities so they can take decisive action, maximizing value and making a meaningful impact on our consumers, our customers and our business.

The Sr. ML Lead will be the principal solution architect within Mars Snacking with the responsibility of making sure that each application is designed keeping in mind the AI strategy for Mars Snacking.

This position will also be responsible to guide and mentor the more junior members of the Data Science community.

What are we looking for
- 7+ years of experience working in a quantitative role preferably in the CPG, or retail industry.
- 4+ years of experience managing a team of data scientists, product analysts or data analysts
- Proven track record of delivering value through AI/ Data Science products in a fast-paced, environment using a scalable and reusable codebase and models to address business problems effectively.
- Partner with business across functions to identify business challenges and opportunities and translate them unto actionable, integrated, data-driven solutions.
- Eagerness to learn, flexibility to pivot when needed, savviness to navigate and thrive in a dynamic environment, and a growth mindset needed to build a successful team
- An understanding of product management principles such as product definition, roadmap building and management, and product releases and commercialization
- A strong customer centric mindset especially within an internal customer base with the purpose of driving value creation, adoption and use
- Strategic thinking, problem solving and innovation, with the ability to anticipate and navigate challenges and opportunities.
- Ensure compliance with analytics standards, including tailoring methodologies to specific use case needs such as ML, AI, and descriptive analytics.
- Ability to translate business needs into analytical frameworks & superior verbal and written communication skills
- Proficiency and hands-on experience in advanced analytics techniques and machine learning algorithms, including NLP, time-series analysis and other relevant methods and willingness to coach data scientists tactically
- Working understanding of ML Ops and DevOps frameworks
- Familiarity with Microsoft Azure tech stack, including but not limited to Azure Data Factory, Synapse Analytics, Databricks, GCP

What will be your key responsibilities
- Applies strong expertise in AI through use of machine learning, data mining, and statistical models to design, prototype and build next generation ML engines and services
- Design, architect and review technical architecture of data science solutions
- Plan and lead data science projects that cover a diverse range of business problems
- Serve as key point of contact with Data Engineering and DevOps teams, for solution architecture and infrastructure design
- Review work of team members identifying optimum methodologies, advising on implementation, and checking business logic
- Use machine learning techniques, visualizations, & statistical analysis to gain insight into various data sets - some readily available, and some you create and curate yourself
- Collaborate with internal and external teams to ensure we focus on product and service recommendations and be a key player in our network of talent
- Contribute to a high performing data science function
- Create repeatable, interpretable, dynamic and scalable models that are seamlessly incorporated into analytic data products
- Performance Monitoring: Define key performance indicators (KPIs) and implement monitoring systems for deployed data platforms and products to ensure efficient operations data operations, effective support services and incident management.
- Solution ideation and Development: Guide a team of data scientists to create fit for purpose solutions using cutting edge analytical and AI methodologies.
- Focus on setting up a Data Science AI program and delivery methodology: Entails, recruiting and forming a team to solve a specific problem elaborating on a programmatic mindset and tracking value delivery

What can you expect from Mars
- Work with diverse and talented Associates, all guided by the Five Principles.
- Join a purpose driven company, where we're striving to build the world we want tomorrow, today.
- Best-in-class learning and development support from day one, including access to our in-house Mars University.
- An industry competitive salary and package, including company bonus.

jobs.title: Machine Learning Architect
jobs.job_description:
Key Responsibilities:
- ML Solution Architecture: Design and develop scalable AI/ML architectures with a focus on Deep Learning, Large Language Models (LLMs), and Natural Language Processing (NLP).
- Model Optimization: Enhance model efficiency, reduce latency, and optimize memory usage for real-time document processing.
- ML Infrastructure Development: Build and manage MLOps pipelines for experimentation, A/B testing, and deployment.
- LLM Pipeline Development: Develop and optimize pipelines using LangChain, LlamaIndex, and other AI frameworks.
- AI Strategy & Solutioning: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align AI models with business objectives.
- Automation & Scalability: Create scalable and automated AI workflows for intelligent document processing.
- Research & Innovation: Stay updated on the latest AI advancements and integrate cutting-edge ML techniques into the platform.

Required Qualifications:
- Experience: 8+ years in AI/ML within a software or product company.
- Expertise: Strong background in Deep Learning, Large Language Models (LLMs), and NLP (e.g., BERT, GPT, RoBERTa).
- Programming: Proficiency in Python with hands-on experience in ML frameworks like PyTorch, TensorFlow, LangChain, and SpaCy.
- LLM Experience: Practical experience with LLaMA, Zephyr, Mistral, and OpenAI APIs.
- MLOps & Deployment: Expertise in MLOps, cloud deployment, and AI model optimization.
- Problem-Solving: Strong analytical skills and a product-first mindset.

Date Posted: 06/02/2025

jobs.title: Software Engineer, Machine Learning Compilers, Silicon
jobs.job_description:
Minimum qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
- 5 years of experience with software development in C++, and with data structures/algorithms.
- 3 years of experience testing, maintaining, or launching software products, with 1 year of experience with software design and architecture.

Preferred qualifications:
- Master's degree or PhD in Computer Science, or a related technical field.
- Experience in power and performance optimizations.
- Experience with domain-specific compilers for machine learning.
- Knowledge of hardware that provides a degree of parallelism.

About the job
Be part of a diverse team that pushes boundaries, developing custom silicon solutions that power the future of Google's direct-to-consumer products. You'll contribute to the innovation behind products loved by millions worldwide. Your expertise will shape the next generation of hardware experiences, delivering unparalleled performance, efficiency, and integration.

As a Software Engineer, you will work on developing Machine Learning (ML) compilers for the Tensor TPU to accelerate machine learning models running on custom hardware accelerators. In this role, you will manage project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables.

Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. We aim to make people's lives better through technology.

Responsibilities
- Build compilers and tools that map Machine Learning models to the hardware Information Security Assurance.
- Evaluate various trade-offs of different parallelization strategies such as performance, power, energy, and memory consumption.
- Collaborate with machine learning researchers to improve the domain-specific compiler.
- Collaborate with hardware engineers to evolve future accelerators.

More Info
Function: Software Development
Job Type: Permanent Job

Skills Required
Power and Performance Optimizations
Domain-Specific Compilers for Machine Learning
Software Design
Algorithms
Data Structures

Date Posted: 06/02/2025

jobs.title: Senior Data Scientist (GenAI)
jobs.job_description:
Roche fosters diversity, equity and inclusion, representing the communities we serve. When dealing with healthcare on a global scale, diversity is an essential ingredient to success. We believe that inclusion is key to understanding people's varied healthcare needs. Together, we embrace individuality and share a passion for exceptional care. Join Roche, where every voice matters.

As a Senior Data Scientist, specializing in Generative AI, you would lead development of a business solution through advanced NLP techniques in an agile delivery mode, working directly with partners in the business teams from Roche affiliates across the globe.

Your Opportunity:
- Work independently and/or lead team of Data Scientists to design and develop pipelines for Develop and implement enterprise-level GenAI models and tools to solve business problems
- Work with partners throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions
- Conduct research to identify emerging trends and technologies in Gen AI and other areas of data science
- Build toolsets and re-usable components for our future projects and ideas and automate the AI solution to achieve maximum efficiency
- Write modularized, production ready code that is easily scalable across data volume and business functions
- Lead project delivery with your Manager through regular meetings, extensive documentation and clear timeline setting
- Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy
- Train junior team members on NLP and ML techniques

Who You Are:
- You hold a bachelor degree with 5-8 years of experience in the Data Science and Generative AI. Preferably, you have a Master's in Data Science, Machine Learning, Statistics, Economics/Econometrics, Computer Science or related field)
- Certifications on AI/ML/Data science would be an added advantage
- Understanding of basic concepts in Text Mining, NLP and NLU, hands-on experience with regular expressions
- Prompt Engineering: be able to craft effective prompts and instructions to guide models towards desired outputs, ensuring coherence, factual accuracy, and alignment with ethical considerations
- Model Optimization: Leverage techniques like RAG, Fine tuning to optimize models
- Experience with modern deep learning architectures for NLP (encoder-decoder, transformers, attention), including: a) hands-on experience with using transformers like Huggingface, SBert, GPT-2/GPT-3 b) capability to build ML/DL pipeline for training/tuning model (including transfer learning)
- Knowing Docker, Kubernetes and cloud platforms (especially AWS) is added advantage
- General understanding of AGILE Project Delivery process
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams
- Strong analytic approach and logical thinking capability, strong QC approach.
